detail.example: The value provided for the attribute is not valid. Check the value used and try again.

pointer.description: JSON pointer (RFC6901) to the offending entity.

telephone_number.description: The telephone number the log message is associated with, if any.

external_connection_id.description: The external connection the log message is associated with, if any.

ticket_id.description: The ticket ID for an operation that generated the log message, if any.
